name: Beads
description:
Beads is a physics-based puzzlevania that revolves around building up a string of beads to increasingly gain access to a minimalistic 2D world of obstacles and puzzles. From its unique form of movement with interesting restrictions emerge plenty opportunities for physics-based as well as logical puzzles.

This prototype was developed by a single person as their very first game jam entry, so expect a small world, very simplistic graphics and many not yet explored opportunities for the main game mechanic. The project was developed in unity and no foreign assets or code were used in it.

Explore, have fun and feel free to leave feedback on the gameplay and puzzling!
